title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Best Divisional Futures w/ Chad Millman + Fake Q’s on Rodgers 'Experience'
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Best Divisional Futures w/ Chad Millman + Fake Q’s on Rodgers 'Experience'
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), including if he’s down with Aaron Rodgers tripping on psychedelics, why Nick Saban is calling 2021 a rebuilding year despite finishing as national championship runner-up, if he’s outraged the Dolphins tampered with Tom Brady, how Vin Scully influenced him as a broadcaster, and if LeBron should retire as a Laker.

Then, the Action Network's Chad Millman and Colin discuss the best and worst Divisional futures for the AFC East (12:00), AFC North (20:00), AFC West (27:00), NFC North (35:00), and the NFC West (42:00). 

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
